title: Launch
description: 10 000 members of our community will be able to mint their NFT pandas

title: Growth
description: Once the NFTs are sold-out, a VIP club will be built where only owners of the Bored Pandas will have access

title: Maturity
description: We will organise different virtual and real events, where we can meet together
Of course, we will join the metaverse
We are establishing a collaboration with a few major company leaders in Clothing, Action-camera and Energy-drink industries to collaborate with us and organise our events together.
Maybe you already know who are they, but details will be announced in the VIP group

title: Split
description: We are aiming to be the largest action community therefore we need to split the interests
We will create different sub-channels based on the interests of our members
Video-games, Winter sports, Water sports, Sky sports, Nature, Biking, Street performance, etc.
In such a way, we will be able to organise our events faster while still being connected with the entire community
